thread.section_title: Stellenbosch Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent value for money
thread.title_full: Excellent value for money - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Laumcdona
title: Excellent value for money
text: Central location near lots of restaurants and shops. Friendly and efficient staff. Fantastic rooms - clean, spacious and the most comfortable beds. Good quality and choice for breakfast. Perfect stay and I would definitely stay here again (this is my 8th hotel in one month as I travel in SA, Stellenbosch Hotel is best value for money)
